data.title: Mark Thomas Mansfield Obituary

data.meta_site_name: Mark Thomas Mansfield Obituary | February 20, 2024 | Mililani Memorial Park & Mortuary - Waipahu, HI
data.text:
Mark Mansfield, 69 passed away peacefully at his home on February 20th 2024. Mark was born in Michigan and move to Hawaii in 1985, where he met his wife. Mark was a loving husband father, grandfather and Great grandfather. He is survived by his wife. Herlinda son Justin, daughter, Trina, 7 grandchildren, Jason, Brandy, Jasmine, Sadie, Makayla, Chad and Natalia and 2 great granddaughters Eva, and Remy. Mark enjoyed bowling and golf and he also loved vacationing in Las Vegas. We are so saddened by his passing, but we know he is in a better place. Private service will be held for Mark.

To send flowers to the family, please visit our floral store.
